critique: This executive order focuses on environmental protection and community revitalization along rivers. It emphasizes collaboration between federal agencies, state/local/tribal governments, and communities. It doesn't directly address immigration, executive power, or national security. It promotes economic revitalization through environmental protection and historic preservation. It also emphasizes community involvement and partnerships, suggesting a focus on diversity and inclusion. The order explicitly states that it does not create any new regulatory authority and will not interfere with matters of State, local, and tribal government jurisdiction.
